markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deepest Wellspring](/Feats.aspx?ID=3693) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 29</row>

</column>

---

You've glimpsed the furthest recesses of your mind. If you have spent at least 3 Focus Points since the last time you [Refocused](/Actions.aspx?ID=71), you recover 3 Focus Points when you Refocus, even if you spent your Focus Points on spells other than psychic abilities.
name: Deepest Wellspring
